security.title: Total privacy

reliability.title: Guaranteed reliability

opensource.title: Transparency and open source

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Found a bug? Have a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getInTouchText: We're always looking to improve FastMinify. Whether you've found a bug, have a feature request, or just want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.minificationNotWorkingText: Make sure your code is valid JavaScript or CSS. Check the browser console for errors.
contact.codeNotCopyingText: Try using the copy button or manually select and copy the text.
contact.themeNotSavingText: Check if your browser allows localStorage. Try refreshing the page.

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.subject: Brief description

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields.
validation.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Free online tool to minify code instantly — fast, modern, and privacy-friendly.

whyMinify.title: What is code minification?
whyMinify.subtitle: Code minification is the process of removing unnecessary characters from source code without changing its functionality. This includes whitespace, comments, and shortening variable names.

performance.title: File size reduction
performance.description: Minification can reduce JavaScript and CSS file sizes by 30-70%, significantly improving page load times.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth optimization
bandwidth.description: Smaller files mean less data transfer, reducing bandwidth costs and improving user experience on slower connections.

security.title: Code obfuscation
security.description: Minified code is harder to read and reverse-engineer, providing a basic level of code protection.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Our minification tool is designed to be simple, fast and secure.

paste.title: Paste your code
paste.description: Copy and paste your code into the left editor. Our automatic detection recognizes the language.

configure.title: Configure options
configure.description: Customize minification according to your needs: compatibility, compression, optimizations.

getResult.title: Get the result
getResult.description: Your minified code appears instantly. Download or copy the result.

seoOptimization.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
seoOptimization.subtitle: Code minification directly improves your search engine ranking and your site's user experience.

codeExamples.title: Minification examples
codeExamples.subtitle: Discover how minification transforms your code to optimize performance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: FastMinify Privacy Policy - Protection of your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: FastMinify is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our online code minification service.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect data necessary for the operation of our service:

types.usage: Anonymized usage data to improve the service

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: Our site uses cookies to improve your user experience and analyze traffic.

googleServices.title: Integrated Google Services
googleServices.content: Our site uses Google services for analytics and advertising:
googleServices.analytics: Google Analytics helps us understand how visitors interact with our site. Data is anonymized and used only for statistical purposes.
googleServices.adsense: Google AdSense displays personalized advertisements. These ads use cookies to show you relevant ads.

dataRights.title: Your Data Rights
dataRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right of access to your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure of your data
rights.objection: Right to object to data processing

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction. Your code is processed securely and is not stored permanently.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the exercise of your rights, you can contact us at contact@fastminify.com.

privacy.footer: This privacy policy may be updated periodically. We will inform you of any significant changes.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.description: FastMinify Legal Notice - Legal information about the site

service.title: Service Description
service.description: FastMinify is a free online tool for minifying, beautifying, and optimizing JavaScript, CSS, JSON, and PHP code. Our service offers:

features.minification: JavaScript, CSS, and JSON code minification

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The content of this site (texts, images, logos, design) is protected by copyright. The code you minify remains your property. FastMinify claims no rights to the code you process.
intellectualProperty.warning: Important: The code you submit to our service remains your property. We do not store your code permanently.

liability.title: Liability Limitation
liability.content: FastMinify is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We strive to provide a reliable service, but we cannot guarantee:

limitations.damages: Absence of damages resulting from service use
limitations.thirdParty: Proper functioning of third-party services (Google Analytics, AdSense)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This site uses cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to use the site, you accept our use of cookies.
cookies.moreInfo: For more information, see our Privacy Policy.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have jurisdiction.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these legal notices at any time. Modifications will take effect upon their publication on the site.

legal.footer: These legal notices comply with current French legislation.
